title: Raja Durai Sam Nishanth, MBBS, MD

sections.heading: Overview
content: Raja Durai Sam Nishanth, MBBS, MD, is a board-certified physician with a strong commitment to patient care and medical research. He holds an MBBS and an MD in general medicine from the American International Medical University. Nishanth has been actively engaged in providing clinical care and patient counseling, earning a reputation for his compassionate approach and diligent work ethic.

In addition to his clinical practice, Nishanth has made notable contributions to the academic and research communities. He has collaborated with several respected health care journals and presented numerous papers at both national and international medical forums.

Nishanth has actively volunteered with global health organizations like World Vision and the WHO, contributing to pediatric case studies on rabies and malnutrition. He is widely recognized for his professionalism, dedication to public health, and commitment to improving health care outcomes worldwide.
